paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information specifically for the BRCA2 gene, including penetrance data.

functional_data.summary: Pathogenic variants identified in BRCA2 are associated with increased risk of breast and ovarian cancer.

variants.segregation_data: Segregation with disease in families not explicitly mentioned.
variants.evidence_level: Moderate evidence based on clinical significance and association with HBOC.
variants.additional_notes: The study identified 47 pathogenic variants in BRCA2 among the cohort.
key_quotes: Pathogenic variants predisposing to HBOC were identified in 11.9% (98/824) individuals at BRCA2 (47/98).
In patients with breast cancer, 48.1% (37/77) were located in BRCA2.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data for BRCA2 variants were extracted from the main text.
